name: A Simple Sandbox Tool
tagline: Run a process under the sandbox control, restrict or grant read/write/execute access to files and directories
body:
### Welcome to Sandbox repository page
This tool was developed as a course requirement for Operating Systems, CSC 501. 

### Author
Aneesh Gupta (agupta27@ncsu.edu)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
